definition: ancient musical intrument shaped as a bell/hoe/spade
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: They probably wouldn't want you to be tired down with them.

definition: to hide, to secrete, to repress/to bend

a kind of vase (old)/see 安瓿[an1 bu4]
variant of 琴[qin2], guqin or zither
